instructions.name: claim_rewards
docs: Claim accumulated staking rewards without unstaking principal
CRITICAL FIX: Burns bTokens to maintain constant exchange rate for all stakers
Formula: Burn (rewards * supply / vault) bTokens to extract rewards fairly

accounts.name: global_fee_token_account
docs: Global fee token account for protocol tax collection

instructions.name: collect_pump_amm_fees
docs: Collect accumulated AMM trading fees from Pump AMM and send to admin's WSOL account
Step 1: CPI to Pump AMM's collect_coin_creator_fee (fees go to bundle's WSOL ATA)
Step 2: Transfer WSOL from bundle's account to admin's account

accounts.name: coin_creator_vault_ata
docs: SECURITY: Validated owner matches vault authority PDA and mint is WSOL

accounts.name: bundle_wsol_account
docs: SECURITY: Validated owner is bundle PDA and mint is WSOL
SECURITY FIX: Fees stay in this account instead of transferring to shared admin wallet

instructions.name: collect_pump_fees
docs: Collect accumulated creator fees from Pump.fun and send to admin
Calls Pump.fun's collectCreatorFee instruction with bundle PDA as signer

accounts.name: fee_sol_vault
docs: SECURITY: Created lazily via create_or_allocate_pda; PDA ensures isolation

accounts.name: user_btoken
docs: User's bToken account - must exist (call prepare_deposit first)

accounts.name: user_stake
docs: User stake tracking - must exist (call prepare_deposit first)

instructions.name: execute_unstake
docs: Step 2 of 2: Execute the unstaking logic
Requires prepare_unstake to be called first to initialize accounts.

accounts.name: global_fee_token_account
docs: Global fee token account - already initialized by prepare_unstake

accounts.name: order
docs: Order account - closed manually to avoid lamport accounting conflicts

accounts.name: pumpfun_mint
docs: The new token mint (must be signer keypair, not PDA)

instructions.name: init_bundle
docs: Initialize a new bundle with PDA-derived mint (single-signer transaction)
# Arguments
* `nonce` - Unique identifier to derive the mint PDA (allows multiple bundles per creator)
* `decimals` - Token decimals for the mint (typically 6)
* `cap_lamports` - Fundraising cap in lamports
* `total_supply` - Total token supply in base units
* `unstake_cooldown` - Cooldown duration for unstaking in seconds

accounts.name: creator
docs: Creator is the only signer - single-signer transaction (no multi-sig needed)

instructions.name: init_global_fee_account
docs: Step 1a-ii: Initialize global fee token account (one-time per real_mint)
SECURITY FIX H-1: This must be called before any unstake/claim operations
to ensure the protocol fee ATA exists. Can be called by anyone.

instructions.name: init_order
docs: InitOrder - Initialize order PDA and vault (Step 1)
Call this before create_order

instructions.name: init_unstake_vault
docs: Step 1a: Initialize shared unstake vault (one-time per bundle)
This must be called once before any user can unstake from this bundle.
Creates the unstake_vault. Also call init_global_fee_account for the real_mint.

accounts.name: unstake_vault
docs: Authority changed from unstake_vault (self) to bundle PDA per security fix

instructions.name: prepare_deposit
docs: PrepareDeposit - Initialize user's bToken and stake accounts before depositing
Call this before deposit_stake if the accounts don't exist yet

accounts.name: user_btoken
docs: User's bToken account - will be created if needed

instructions.name: prepare_unstake
docs: Step 1b: Prepare user accounts for unstaking
Call init_unstake_vault first (once per bundle), then this (per user).
This split reduces stack usage to prevent BPF stack overflow.

instructions.name: presale_exit
docs: PresaleExit - Allow users to exit their presale position and recover SOL
Only available before bundle finalization
Returns proportional SOL from escrow minus 1% protocol fee

accounts.name: user_btoken
docs: User's bToken account (to be burned)

instructions.name: recover_fee_vault
docs: CRITICAL FIX: Recover stuck tokens from fee_vault (drip mechanism is deprecated)
Only admin can call this to prevent loss of accidentally sent tokens

instructions.name: set_cpi_enabled
docs: SECURITY: CPI kill switch - allows admin to disable external CPI calls
if Pump.fun/AMM changes their program and breaks compatibility.
When disabled: finalize_pumpfun, collect_pump_fees, collect_pump_amm_fees will fail.

instructions.name: sync_supply
docs: Admin-only: sync tracked bToken supply with actual mint supply.
Useful to heal historic drift while keeping the invariant strict elsewhere.

instructions.name: withdraw_sol_fees
docs: Withdraw accumulated SOL fees from the segregated fee vault to admin wallet
SECURITY: Only admin or protocol operator can withdraw
This allows manual recovery if the buyback bot fails or for accounting purposes

instructions.name: withdraw_wsol_fees
docs: Withdraw accumulated WSOL fees from bundle's WSOL account to admin's WSOL account
SECURITY: Only admin or protocol operator can withdraw

errors.name: DecimalsMismatch
errors.msg: Real mint decimals must match bToken decimals

errors.name: StakeCooldownActive
errors.msg: Must wait 5 minutes since last stake (Testing)

errors.name: UnstakeNotReady
errors.msg: Unstake request not ready (5 minutes cooldown)

errors.name: PendingUnstake
errors.msg: Must fully claim existing unstake before requesting new unstake

errors.name: InvalidCooldown
errors.msg: Unstake cooldown must be between 10 seconds and 30 days

errors.name: AmountTooSmall
errors.msg: Amount too small, does not meet minimum requirements

errors.name: OrderVaultNotEmpty
errors.msg: Order vault must be empty before closing

errors.name: AccountNotInitialized
errors.msg: Account must be initialized via prepare instruction first

errors.name: DripInProgress
errors.msg: Cannot recover fee vault while drip is in progress

errors.name: InvalidTokenAccount
errors.msg: Invalid token account - owner or mint mismatch

errors.name: CpiDisabled
errors.msg: CPI operations are currently disabled for safety

errors.name: SupplyMismatch
errors.msg: Supply invariant violated: tracked supply does not match mint supply

errors.name: InvalidMintOwner
errors.msg: Mint owner is invalid after CPI - expected SPL Token program

errors.name: InvalidMintState
errors.msg: Mint state is invalid after CPI - account not properly initialized

errors.name: InvalidTokenAccountMint
errors.msg: Token account mint does not match expected mint

errors.name: InvalidTokenAccountAuthority
errors.msg: Token account authority does not match expected authority
